title.en: Joya Kagemaru's Historical Drama Masterpiece Selection

altTitles.ja: 影丸穣也時代劇傑作選

description.en:
The world is the Sengoku period---
Wild samurai, blacksmiths, strategists, hunters, and young swordsmen who survive the turbulent times
A collection of masterpieces by masters depicting their respective youth !
Five gems of period dramas released by graphic artist Joya Kagemaru

"Handless"
Shishimaru, a young man from the Nobushidan, has his older brother brutally murdered and both his arms taken away due to a plot for supremacy! He carries a keepsake sword in his arms. Shishimaru's revenge story begins.

"Death Forge"
The country of Bizen is on the brink of a major drought. The divine sword forged by a swordsmith to be offered to a rain-making ceremony has demonic properties! Is it a famous sword or a magical sword?

"The Great Citadel"
In the Sengoku era, there was a wandering genius tactician who captured castles one after another and earned a bounty! This man, who mercilessly betrayed even his allies, was known as the Great Citadel. What is the real reason to challenge the strategy!?

"Teppo Yata"
A gun is not a tool to kill people, but a tool to save people! This depicts the pride and way of life of Yata, a Matagi boy who stakes his life on a gun. A huge moving story.

"Little Samurai"
Shintaro, a young swordsman who lost his father, sets out on a journey with a strange trio of talented ronin Kage Ryoma and loyal dog Deka. A must-see, an unusual journey filled with laughter and tears!!
